cause.description:
Heartbeat of Miami's Pregnancy Help Medical Clinics provide free pregnancy tests, ultrasound verification, counseling, material assistance, adoption referrals, pre-natal care referral, parenting/pre-natal classes, post-abortive counseling, sexual integrity classes, and more, to women with an unplanned pregnancy.
Heartbeat of Miami is a 501 (3)c Non-Profit Organization.
We are supported by the Christian Community.
We need prayers, financial support and volunteers so that we may continue doing what God has called us to do.
If you would like to be part of this winsome ministry, please donate here: https://www.egivingsystems.org/v3.0/index.php
Or for volunteer opportunities or more information, contact us at 305-863-2155 - www.heartbeatofmiami.org
*NEWS UPDATE*
Heartbeat of Miami now has two Pregnancy Help Medical Clinics to serve women in our Community that find themselves with an unplanned pregnancy.
Hialeah - 380 W. 49th Street Hialeah, FL 33012 (305)821-9970.
North Miami - 12060 NW 7th Avenue, North Miami, FL 33168 (305) 685-6010.
1. There are other choices available for a woman with an unplanned pregnancy. Please help us save lives!
